name: Dice Golf
description: This is the current state of the first game I have ever attempted to make in Pico-8. It is a small puzzle game featuring a golf ball and the goal is to get it to the flag in every level. The twist is that you can only move by 1,2,3,4, or 5 spaces, and you can only use each number once per level. Avoid obstacles, pick up power-ups, and golf your way to a win!
